statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks. And the thought was that [the thought/prediction], you know, ‘it [an influenza pandemic from H5N1]’s just imminent now that we're going to see an influenza pandemic from H5N1.’
